cont.entity_a: Sound quality is excellent with clear audio and no background noise.
cont.entity_b: Sound is clear and of good quality, not high fidelity. Sound quality is good but lacks noise isolation. Sound is muffled and requires equalizer adjustments. Sound quality is good for the price, but lacks bass. Long-lasting with clear sound but not noise-canceling.

cont.entity_a: Headphones are well-constructed and comfortable to wear. Earcup design can cause discomfort after prolonged use. Comfortable for short periods but causes soreness over time.
cont.entity_b: Comfortable and no problem using over hearing aids. Comfortable for long periods with large earcups. Fit is tight and uncomfortable for extended use.

cont.entity_a: Joints on the headpiece can snap easily.
cont.entity_b: Plastic covering degrades over time. Cord can break easily and may not fit tightly into devices.

cont.entity_a: Expensive, but worth it if bought below $150. Priced high but offers good sound quality and performance.
cont.entity_b: Affordable price with good sound quality for the cost. Good value for the price but lacks durability.

cont.entity_a: Batteries need replacement as they don't hold a charge after three years. Rechargeable batteries and built-in charger are included. Energizer lithium batteries last longer than included rechargeables. Requires removing batteries for charging.
Line-of-sight requirement for infrared signal can be disruptive. Headphones are well-constructed.
cont.entity_b: Headphones are collapsible for easy transport. Headphones are lightweight and adjustable.

cont.entity_a: Surround sound effects are impressive and enhance the listening experience. Inputs include laser, left-right audio, and digital coax. Dolby and DTS stereo decoding capabilities are available. The headphones work well for short-range use. Range is greater than specified, but must maintain line-of-sight. No equalization adjustment for high frequencies.
cont.entity_b: Requires an amp to bring out full sound quality. Volume control is a useful feature. Volume control on the headphones is a key feature.

cont.entity_a: Volume is adjustable and strong, with no static.

cont.entity_b: Long cord is convenient but can be cumbersome. Cord can break easily and may not fit tightly into devices.
